logged_out.subtitle: All the Book Buzz in Once Place
logged_out.track_books: Keep track of books you've read, want to read, and are currently reading.
logged_out.share_friends: Share your thoughts about what you're reading and see what your friends think of their books.
logged_out.read_rate: Rate, review, and recommmend books or something. I dunno. It's early days, my friends!

404.subheader: It looks like the page you requested doesn't exist. Please try a different one!

permissions.label: Profile Visibility
permissions.following: Following (only accounts you follow can see you)

login.login_required_field_blank: You must enter both a valid email address and password.
login.create_required_field_blank: You must complete all required fields.

help.text: This refers to where the search tries to look for data. Each source can be easily contributed to if you want to add missing books or correct errors.
help.inventaire: Sources and extends data from WikiData, the service structure that powers Wikipedia and the like. Offers as many language options as possible.
help.openLibrary: Sources data from Internet Archive and may provide a digital copy to read. Only offers English unless a work is in another language.

search.no_results_suggestion: If you're expecting book data, go and help fill out the Inventaire database!

api.already_logged_in: You are already logged in! You cannot create an account or log in again.

account.username_exists: The username entered is already in use.
account.email_send_fail: Your account was created successfully, but we were unable to send the confirmation email!
account.email_exists: The email address entered is already in use.

create.fail: Something went wrong and the account could not be created. Please try again later.
create.required_data_missing: Could not create account because required data is missing.
create.invalid_email: The email address entered is not valid.
create.invalid_username: The username entered is not valid. Usernames must be at least 2 characters long and can only contain letters a–z, numbers 0–9, and underscores.
create.invalid_permissionLevel: The permissionLevel entered is not valid. PermissionLevel must be one 100, 33, or 0. Contact the front-end developer and ask them to fix their permission selector.
create.success: Account created successfully! You may now log in using the email address and password you provided.

confirm.email: A confirmation email has been sent to the address you specified. Please confirm your account using the link provided.
confirm.required_data_missing: Could not confirm account because required data is missing.
confirm.invalid_code: The specified confirmation code is not valid.
confirm.update_fail: Something went wrong and we couldn't confirm your account. Please try again later!
confirm.email_send_fail: Your account has been confirmed, but we were unable to send the email notification about it. You can log in anyway.
confirm.success_email: Your account has been confirmed, and an email notification has been sent! You may now log in using your email address and password.
confirm.success: Your account has been confirmed! You may now log in using your email address and password.

login.required_data_missing: Could not attempt login because required data is missing.
login.invalid_email: The email address specified does not have an associated account.
login.not_confirmed: The specified account has not been confirmed. Please use the link you received to confirm your email address.
login.invalid_password: The password specified is not correct.
login.success: You have been successfully logged in! You will now be redirected to the home screen.

validate.missing_token: User not logged in: There is no login token to validate.
validate.invalid_token: User not logged in: The stored token is not a valid token.
validate.renewed_token: User logged in, and the token has been renewed.
